name: Advanced Progress Bar
description: Generates an HTML structure for a progress bar with customizable steps, current stage, completed stages, and primary color.
author: Your Name <your.email@example.com>

params.name: steps
params.description: Comma-separated list of steps, e.g., 'Start, Houses, End'.

params.name: primaryColor
params.description: Hex code for the primary color, e.g., '#FFFFFF'.

params.name: completedStages
params.description: Comma-separated list of completed stage indices, e.g., '1,3'.

result.description: HTML string for the progress bar.
